# (PART) Widgets in iFrames {-}

# Leaflet

## Example 1

```{r leaflet-01}
library(leaflet)
library(widgetframe)
l <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% setView(0,0,2)
frameWidget(l, height = '400')
```

## Example 2

```{r leaflet-02}
l <- leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>%
  setView(0,0,2)
frameWidget(l, height = '400')
```
